Rockville.KID Museum:
KID Museum (Kid International Discovery Museum) is a children's museum and child-oriented maker space in the Washington, D.C. suburb of Bethesda, Maryland.
As of 2017, the small museum operates on the lower floor of Bethesda's Davis Library, with plans to expand to a larger site.
The Washington Post describes KID as "community art studio and laboratory, where visitors can experiment with wind tunnels, build drawing robots, try their hand at computer programming and construct sculptures out of cardboard."
